activities: Global Water Management, through its FATHOM OS application, provides services to freshwater and wastewater utility companies. Services include measuring water usage, creating bills and accepting payments. FATHOM OS also provides online access to customer’s usage, billing and account history.
industrysector: Water Resources Eqpt & Services - (WRE)Computer Services - (CSV)Computer Software - (CSF)
personaldata: Offline, online, manually processed personal and billing information.
recoursemech: Global Water Management has contracted with the Better Business Bureau (BBB) EU Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution (http://www.bbb.org/us/european-dispute-resolution)
